titleStmt.title: A defence of Paul Bassano the suruiuing patentee for the importation of fresh salmons and lobsters, &c. by a new inuention, which hee most humbly submitteth to this honorable house of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Bassano, Paul.
England and Wales. Parliament.
